meanings.sent1: The obliterative storm left nothing standing in its path.
meanings.sent2: The bulldozer's obliterative force leveled the old building in minutes.
meanings.sent3: The obliterative power of the vacuum cleaner sucked up everything in its way.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like an obliterative wave, wiping out any chance of reconciliation.
meanings.sent5: The obliterative impact of the explosion echoed through the empty streets.
